strings.Value: "I'm not going to pass your stupid trials. Get out of my kingdom!"
[Attack] "How about you tell me â€“ are you ready to die?"
"And how do you imagine I'm going to face a whole swarm of monsters without killing any of them?"
"Wait a bit. I wish to prepare."

{n}A man in a ceremonial robe stands near the temple, surrounded by monsters lying still like little sheep. He greets you with a deep bow. His voice is soft, almost a whisper.{/n} "Your H-Highness. Are you r-ready for the trial?"

"I am. Every hour. But not b-by your h-hand." {n}Visaka casts a spell and boundless peace and tranquility descend upon you. Unable to even reach for your weapon, you watch Visaka leave with the monsters.{/n}
"V-Visaka the Unicorn from the Suramgamin Order."
"These c-creatures are lost. I will send them home, to the {g|First World}F-First World{/g}. But f-f-first you will have to show you are capable of holding them back without shedding any blood."

"I shall lift the s-spell and commence the r-ritual. While I open the portal, you must defend yourself. But you must not kill. If a single one of these creatures dies, you will not p-pass this trial."
"It's up to you. Such is the nature of your trial."
